translated: Republic of the Union of Myanmar Model: Bi Pyidaungzu Naingngandaw Myanma Flag Coat Happiness is in a disciplined life harmoniously Map Geographic capital Naypyidaw largest city Rangoon area 678,500 km² Water 3.41% Border Country Bangladesh China.
